mapper.insert: insert into notification (id, notifier, receiver, outerId, gmt_create, `status`, notifier_login, outer_title) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notifierLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outerTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update notification set notifier = #{notifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outerId = #{outerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notifier_login = #{notifierLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outer_title = #{outerTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, notifier, receiver, outerId, gmt_create, `status`, notifier_login, outer_title from notification
